source.content:
Assuming #MichaelBrown and #DorianJohnson were involved in robbery, when can we expect President Obama's apology to the #Ferguson PD?
#tcot

comment.content: @larryelder #BeerSummit

ISIS buries ppl alive. Cut off heads. Crucify. Women. Children.
At their worst 2 compare 2 Ferguson? 
#Ignorant

@angryblackpat now that makes no sense..@WutangGeorgia

@angryblackpat @Coslopuss took martial arts and did something about it. u don't see me whining over how poorly i was treated in a ghetto

@angryblackpat that's on you..that's how you feel about yourself..sorry..but this is old..gotta go @WutangGeorgia

@angryblackpat @Coslopuss u get out of it by rising above it. not putting energy into darkness. it only fuels more darkness.
@angryblackpat @Coslopuss it really is a choice, a mindset.
@angryblackpat @Coslopuss UR going to feel angry as long as u perceive this to b  ur reality. truth is most people i know aren't racist

@angryblackpat @Coslopuss being white. we just wondered what did we do to justify this. it was an old projection put on us for things we
@angryblackpat @Coslopuss didn't even do. people before me may have but those days are gone and rejected by most sane people
